document_title: Joint pain: Causes, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: dau-khop.json_8_How to care for patients with joint pain
subsection_content:
People with joint pain need to clearly understand the condition and determine the cause. Relatives need to compile data about the patient's condition to create a reasonable care plan. The care plan should consider the patient's condition, find priority issues and note:
Let the patient rest, lie in a comfortable position, avoid positions that affect the joints and cause increased joint pain.; Instruct patients to exercise their joints to limit complications; Help patients have a healthy, nutritious diet, eat lots of green vegetables and fruits; Periodic medical examination and testing as prescribed by the doctor; Help patients take and inject medication as prescribed by the doctor.

The hospital is also equipped with a system of modern machinery and imaging equipment such as: Somatom Drive 768-slice CT scanner, new generation magnetic resonance machine Magnetom Amira BioMatrix, bone density measuring machine, ultrasound machine. minus…; Opmi Vario 700 Zeiss surgical microscope system, Meera-Maquet operating table... to be able to detect injuries early and successfully surgically treat musculoskeletal diseases...
Tam Anh General Hospital also owns a spacious clinic system and high-class boarding area; modern rehabilitation area; Comprehensive post-operative care process helps patients quickly recover and stabilize their health after surgery.
